description.value: The witch counts as a plant creature for the purpose of growing leshys. She adds leaf leshys, gourd leshys, fungus leshys, seaweed leshys, and lotus leshys to the list of creatures she can summon with @Compendium[pf1.spells.kyo0kwhw2jhuztju]{Summon Monster I}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.26vm5jhjkxpq1xm3]{Summon Monster II}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.1zmn8vqy3s5l9kiv]{Summon Monster III}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqri3zf6mzgd4di6]{Summon Monster IV}, and @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd7ukybisvv7j5r6]{Summon Monster V}, respectively.
